resourceTemplates.name: o365-subscriptions-list
resourceTemplates.title: List current subscriptions
resourceTemplates.description: Returns all current subscriptions and webhook status for the tenant.

resourceTemplates.name: o365-content-latest24h
resourceTemplates.title: List available content (last 24h)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns available content blobs for the last 24 hours for the specified contentType (Audit.AzureActiveDirectory, Audit.Exchange, Audit.SharePoint, Audit.General, DLP.All).

resourceTemplates.name: o365-content-range
resourceTemplates.title: List available content (time range)
resourceTemplates.description: Returns available content blobs within a specific UTC time window. The window must be ≤ 24 hours and start time must be ≤ 7 days ago.

resourceTemplates.name: o365-content-retrieve
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve content blob
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the actual audit events from a 'contentUri' provided by subscriptions/content or a webhook. Content expires after approximately 7 days.

resourceTemplates.name: o365-notifications-list
resourceTemplates.title: List webhook notifications
resourceTemplates.description: Returns a history of webhook notifications delivered to your endpoint. Useful for debugging delivery issues.

resourceTemplates.name: o365-dlp-sensitive-types
resourceTemplates.title: List DLP sensitive types
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the list of Data Loss Prevention sensitive information types. Supports an optional Accept-Language header for localization.
